channel.title: This board
channel.description:
This board is for all programming languages in general. Post your programs you've made here or help someone else. Tutorials are fine.
We should strain that this board is only for "proper" (c,c++,c#,java etc etc) programming languages therefore applications made with the aid of another application and scripts is not programming. For example, a game written in java using a pre-made engine is acceptable while making a game with rpg maker isn't.
The [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342270.0.html]Global forum rules[/url] apply here.

item.title: This board
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

This board is for all programming languages in general. Post your programs you’ve made here or help someone else. Tutorials are fine.

We should strain that this board is only for “proper” (c,c++,c#,java etc etc) programming languages therefore applications made with the aid of another application and scripts is not programming. For example, a game written in java using a pre-made engine is acceptable while making a game with rpg maker isn’t.

The Global forum rules apply here.
